"Okay, here we go."
And I took the other bottle.
And I got into my bathtub,
um, and had barricaded the door.
What had actually woken my roommate up
was my cat outside the bathroom door, like, losing her mind.
translation.ko: 제 고양이가 욕실 밖에서 미친 듯이 울었거든요

translation.en: I, um, was sent to the ICU.
And I was in a coma for several… several days.
I don't think that I would have ever attempted to take my own life
had that moment of being posted never occurred.
That is the catalyst
that mentally snapped something in my brain.
A short while after I had finally gotten home from the hospital,
translation.ko: 병원에서 나온 지 얼마 안 돼서

translation.en: a woman named Charlotte Laws reached out to me.
And she told me she was looking to pursue
some sort of legal action against Hunter
and would I mind sharing some of my story.
translation.ko: 제 이야기를 들려줄 수 있냐고 하셨어요

translation.en: I spoke to Cara. She was wounded.
She was completely devastated over having her nude picture online.
translation.ko: 나체 사진이 인터넷에 올라와서 크게 충격을 받았더라고요

translation.en: It just made me more determined
translation.ko: 모든 피해자가 사진을 내릴 수 있게

translation.en: to try and help all the victims get their pictures down.
She really inspired that little bit of hope that…
I think I'd been hopeless for so long, I was very grateful to have that support,
translation.ko: 너무 오랫동안 절망했지만 누가 응원해 줘서 정말 고마웠어요

translation.en: because there was the other end of the Internet who was like,
"Yay, Hunter, you're doing amazing!"
It's just like, "No, you're doing so much damage."
translation.ko: 하지만 샬럿 씨는 제 편이 돼 주셨어요

translation.en: [Charles] So Charlotte was carrying on her own battle.
And then one day, when I came home from work, there was a fax on the fax machine.
translation.ko: 하루는 퇴근하고 집에 왔는데 팩스 한 장이 와 있었어요

translation.en: [Charles] It was for Charlotte, but I read it.
Here's what it says. Hard to believe. "Hey, ugly bitch, get off Hunter's dick."
translation.ko: 내용은 이랬어요, 믿을 수 없었죠 '이 못생긴 년아 헌터를 건들지 마'

translation.en: "If you don't, we'll rape you
and put a shotgun
down your throat."
Well, that was what it said.
I thought,
"Okay, that's really…"
"That's… That's the case, isn't it? That's a case for war."
And I realized at that moment
that I had been slow to act,
and it was time for me to take action as an attorney
without any further delay.
I picked up the phone, and I called Hunter Moore's attorney.
And I told him copyright law is clear.
The photo belonged to Kayla.
The photograph had been stolen, so it was clearly theft.
And I told him it would cost his client huge fees,
translation.ko: 그 사람 의뢰인에게 돈이 많이 필요할 거라고도 했죠

translation.en: whereas my client, who was my stepdaughter,
had a free lawyer. [chuckles]
That was her piece of good fortune.
I said, "This is a good deal for your client."
translation.ko: 저는 그 사람 의뢰인에게 이로운 거래라고 했어요

translation.en: "All he has to do is remove one picture from his site."
"And if he doesn't, I will file action, and it will cost him thousands."
translation.ko: 안 그러면 소송에서 막대한 대가를 치를 거라고 말했죠

translation.en: "You know that. I know that. And you've got 30 minutes to get it done."
translation.ko: 서로 잘 아는 얘기이니 30분 준다고 했습니다

translation.en: I remember Charles. This guy was seriously pissed off.
And I said, "Look, ultimatums aren't gonna work well with Hunter."
translation.ko: 저는 헌터에게 최후통첩이 통하지 않을 거라고 했습니다

translation.en: "They don't fly well with him, but let me give him a call
translation.ko: 헌터와 안 맞는 얘기지만 일단 의뢰인에게 전화해서

translation.en: and see what I could do to have it taken down."
translation.ko: 사진을 내릴 수 있나 알아보겠다고 했습니다

translation.en: After I got off the phone with Charles, I immediately called Hunter.
translation.ko: 찰스와 통화한 후 바로 헌터에게 전화했어요

translation.en: I was pissed. I was pissed off that I'm still cleaning up Hunter's messes.
translation.ko: 헌터가 저지른 사고를 아직도 제가 수습해서 화가 났었죠

translation.en: I told him he should take down the picture right away.
Charles was adamant that someone hacked Kayla's email.
Being told from a lawyer-to-lawyer standpoint, you take him more seriously.
translation.ko: 같은 변호사가 하는 말이니 더 심각하게 들렸어요

translation.en: After the incident with Kayla Laws, I took every step
translation.ko: 케일라 로스 사건 이후로 저는 헌터 무어의 행동과

translation.en: to remove myself formally from any activity with Hunter Moore.
translation.ko: 공식적으로 거리를 두려고 모든 절차를 밟았어요

translation.en: Kayla and I, uh, went in the other room, and we watched the clock
translation.ko: 케일라와 저는 다른 방으로 가서 시계를 보고 또 봤어요

translation.en: and watched the clock.
And we just keep refreshing it and refreshing it and refreshing it.
translation.ko: 그리고 새로 고침 버튼을 계속 눌렀어요

translation.en: [Charlotte] We were very nervous.
Hoping and praying that it was gonna come down.
And then after 30 minutes, we looked on the site.
Finally.
Finally, it's removed.
I feel this just big wave of relief over me.
[Charles] Charlotte came in and said, "It's done. It's down."
Well, I felt very well satisfied
and very pleased and very happy on Kayla's behalf.
As far as Kayla was concerned, that was the end of the matter.
She wanted life to go straight back to normal. She didn't wanna think about it again.
translation.ko: 다시 평범하게 살고 그 문제는 잊고 싶어 했죠

translation.en: And I was of the same mind.
But Charlotte could not let it go.
translation.ko: 하지만 샬럿은 그냥 잊을 수 없었어요

translation.en: Charles said, "Okay. It's time to stop."
Kayla wanted me to stop as well. But I had no intention of stopping.
translation.ko: 케일라도 그만하라고 했지만 저는 그럴 생각 없었어요

translation.en: There's no way I'm just gonna abandon all of these women I said I would help.
translation.ko: 제가 돕기로 한 여자들을 버릴 수는 없잖아요

translation.en: I mean, I'm just not gonna do that.
You wanna fuck with me? I'mma fuck with you.
translation.ko: 나랑 해보자는 거야? 나도 똑같이 해 줄게

translation.en: That's what I do.
Hunter was continuing to destroy lives.
[Hunter] I'm a badass fucking dude.
I had to fight to take down his website completely,
translation.ko: 그 웹사이트를 완전히 폐쇄하고 헌터를 인터넷에서 차단하려면

translation.en: to get him off the Internet.
But if I was going to war against Hunter Moore,
I'd need some allies to bring him down.
